ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ok here we go agian...
ygData.msgSnippet: You re just level 10 now. Shaman, at the higher levels, don t melee very much, if at all. You ll be there to buff your group and debuff and slow the mob
ygData.messageBody:
You're just level 10 now. Shaman, at the higher
levels, don't melee very much, if at all. You'll be
there to buff your group and debuff and slow the mob
mostly. So you want to make sure your spells aren't
fizzling every time you try to cast them. Power
leveling will increase the chances that your spells
will fizzle more often.

Also, if you zoom up there in levels, you may not
quite know how to play your character. The game gets a
bit different after level 25, and changes greatly
after 50. So you should take your time and enjoy the
game, and learn how to play your character well. :)


--- Gerald Duren <godsmacksonlyfan@...> wrote:

> well i would like to be able to use better
> weapons...so WHEN i can hit some thing i hit it
> hard...i usaly have to solo it all the time...it sux
> bad...
> ty and i am greatful for ur imput.
>
>
> --- David Dearstone <greystryx@...> wrote:
>
> >
> > Hey, I wouldn't Power lvl a caster. In my opnion,
> > you need to be working on your spell skills and
> > power lvling will get you past your skill and your
> > spells will fizzle alot. Just what I learned the
> > hard way. Hope it helps.
> >

=====
~~~~~~~~~

Sarchasm: The gulf between the author of sarcastic wit and the recipient who just doesn't get it.
